## Collaboration with James Carter

::: {.event-meta}
📅 Oct 2011 | 📍 Nouméa
:::

A memorable performance with world-renowned jazz saxophonist James Carter, resulting in a standing ovation.

*   **New Caledonia Weekly Article:** [STANDING OVATION (PDF)](../pdfs/STANDING-OVATION1.pdf){target="_blank"}
*   [See Event Details in Archive](/events/archive.qmd#2011)

> James Carter et Vanuella Watt se sont rencontrés sur scène lors du
> concert au Méridien et ce fût une telle réussite qu’ils ont décidé de
> remettre ça pour le plus grand plaisir de nos oreilles ! Le Maître
> américain et la Diva calédonienne nous offriront un duo d’exception,
> mêlant leurs voix et leurs instruments respectifs. A ne pas manquer !

:::

## Australia Tours & Appearances (2013)

::: {.event-meta}
📅 April 2013 | 📍 Sydney & Canberra
:::

Performances at Alliance Française Sydney and as part of Canberra's centenary celebrations.

*   **Sydney (Apr 10):** [Event Link](http://www.afsydney.com.au/cultural-events/music/vanuella-watt/){target="_blank"} | [What's On](http://whatson.cityofsydney.nsw.gov.au/events/20114-vanuella-watt-the-diva-from-the-pacific){target="_blank"} | [YouTube Clip](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b5B2t_sFp70){target="_blank"}
*   **Canberra (Apr 6-7):** [Event Link](http://www.events.act.gov.au/australia-vive-la-france){target="_blank"} | [Program PDF](../pdfs/Vive-La-France.pdf){target="_blank"}
*   [See Event Details in Archive](/events/archive.qmd#2013)

> **Vanuella, La Diva du Pacifique (Bio Snippet for Sydney 2013)**
> Vanuella is often described as the Diva from the Pacific, because of
> her powerful and versatile voice. Her repertoire covers a vast array
> of musical genres from Jazz standards, Bossa Nova, Soul Music, Pop and
> French traditional songs, all performed with her unique Pacific touch.
> Vanuella started singing at the age of 8, and has performed in many
> countries including Australia, France, Fiji, Vanuatu, New Zealand, and
> New Caledonia...

:::
